content: Is there not a 1.4.x version of the cql engine available remotely? It seems like only 1.3.13 and 1.5.2 are published at https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/org/opencds/cqf/cql/engine/

Artifact named changed:

https://search.maven.org/artifact/org.opencds.cqf.cql/engine/1.4.0/

However, the 1.5.X engine is backwards-compatible through 1.3 and includes a number of bug fixes and performance enhancements. I'd recommend using that if possible.

Thank you, I will use 1.5.2 we're upgrading from 1.2.53 so there's 2+ years of changes we're shifting through, but I think for script parsing there's no issues, we're only worried about the fhir service's behavior changes.
